page.title: 11Churches of Aston Clinton
page.content: In our area there are three places of worship.A Baptist Church in Aston Clinton,a Church of England in Buckland and another also in Drayton Beachaump.The Baptist Church a Georgian building was built in 1797 and its first full-time minister is Mr Nash.It is situated on Green End Street in the middle of Aston Clinton. The Church in Drayton Beachaump is called St.Mary's and is near part of the Wendover Branch of the Grand Union Canal.The All Saints Church was built in the 16th Century in Buckland,a small village on the edge of Aston Clinton.The present Rector is Mr.Lewis who is also Rector at Aston Clinton and Drayton Beachaump churches.This came about when the three parishes joined in 1964.Although he had been Rector at Drayton Beachaump unofficially.
